statements: SELECT * FROM supplier_approval_workflow WHERE approval_status = 'pending';
SELECT supplier_name, supplier_email FROM supplier_approval_workflow WHERE supplier_id = 1;
SELECT supplier_name, supplier_email, stakeholder_role FROM supplier_approval_workflow WHERE stakeholder_role = 'admin' AND approval_status = 'pending';
SELECT * FROM supplier_approval_workflow WHERE last_updated > '2022-01-01';
SELECT supplier_id, supplier_name, supplier_email, approval_status FROM supplier_approval_workflow WHERE stakeholder_role = 'manager';
SELECT supplier_name, supplier_email, approval_status FROM supplier_approval_workflow WHERE supplier_id = 1 ORDER BY supplier_name ASC
SELECT supplier_name, stakeholder_role FROM supplier_approval_workflow WHERE approval_status = 'pending' ORDER BY last_updated DESC
SELECT * FROM supplier_approval_workflow WHERE stakeholder_role = 'Manager' AND notification_sent = TRUE ORDER BY last_updated ASC
SELECT supplier_name, supplier_email FROM supplier_approval_workflow WHERE approval_status IN ('approved', 'rejected') AND notification_sent = FALSE ORDER BY supplier_email ASC
SELECT supplier_name, supplier_email, stakeholder_role FROM supplier_approval_workflow WHERE last_updated > '2022-01-01 00:00:00' ORDER BY last_updated DESC
SELECT * FROM suppliers;
SELECT supplier_name, approval_status FROM suppliers ORDER BY approval_date DESC;
SELECT supplier_name, approval_status, approval_date FROM suppliers WHERE approval_status = 'Approved';
SELECT supplier_name, COUNT(supplier_id) AS total_suppliers FROM suppliers GROUP BY supplier_name HAVING COUNT(supplier_id) > 1;
SELECT stakeholder_name, email, phone_number FROM stakeholders ORDER BY stakeholder_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM suppliers WHERE approval_status = 'Approved';
SELECT supplier_name, approval_date FROM suppliers ORDER BY approval_date DESC;
SELECT supplier_name, notification_email FROM suppliers WHERE approval_status = 'Pending' AND notification_email LIKE '%@example.com';
SELECT * FROM stakeholders WHERE role = 'Manager' AND receive_alerts = true ORDER BY stakeholder_name ASC;
SELECT stakeholder_name, email, phone_number FROM stakeholders WHERE phone_number IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM suppliers WHERE approval_status = 'Approved';
SELECT supplier_name, contact_email FROM suppliers ORDER BY supplier_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM alerts WHERE alert_date >= '2021-12-01' AND alert_date <= '2021-12-31';
SELECT notification_text FROM notifications WHERE LENGTH(notification_text) > 100;
SELECT * FROM suppliers WHERE supplier_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT * FROM suppliers WHERE supplier_id = 1
SELECT supplier_name, approval_status FROM suppliers ORDER BY supplier_id DESC
SELECT * FROM notifications WHERE notification_date < '2022-01-01' ORDER BY notification_date ASC
SELECT supplier_name, contact_email FROM suppliers WHERE approval_status = 'approved'
SELECT notification_text, notification_date FROM notifications WHERE notification_text LIKE '%urgent%'
SELECT * FROM Suppliers;
SELECT supplier_name, supplier_email FROM Suppliers WHERE approval_status = 'Approved';
SELECT supplier_name AS name, supplier_email AS email FROM Suppliers ORDER BY supplier_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM Notifications WHERE notification_type = 'Urgent' ORDER BY notification_date DESC;
SELECT supplier_name, supplier_email, approval_status FROM Suppliers WHERE approval_status = 'Pending' AND supplier_id > 100 ORDER BY supplier_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM Suppliers WHERE approval_status = 'Pending';
SELECT supplier_name, supplier_email FROM Suppliers ORDER BY supplier_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM Approvals WHERE approval_date < '2022-01-01';
SELECT supplier_id, supplier_name FROM Suppliers WHERE approval_status = 'Approved' AND supplier_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT notification_type, notification_message FROM Notifications WHERE notification_date >= '2021-10-01' ORDER BY notification_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM Suppliers;
SELECT supplier_name, supplier_email FROM Suppliers ORDER BY supplier_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM Suppliers WHERE approval_status = 'pending';
SELECT supplier_name, supplier_email, approval_status FROM Suppliers WHERE supplier_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM Notifications ORDER BY notification_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT supplier_name, supplier_email FROM Suppliers WHERE approval_status = 'approved';
SELECT * FROM Contacts WHERE contact_name LIKE '%John%' ORDER BY contact_id DESC;
SELECT supplier_name, approval_date FROM Suppliers JOIN Approvals ON Suppliers.supplier_id = Approvals.supplier_id WHERE approval_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT notification_message, notification_date FROM Notifications WHERE recipient_email = 'example@email.com';
SELECT * FROM Suppliers LEFT JOIN Alerts ON Suppliers.supplier_email = Alerts.recipient_email;
